title: Welcome to the Platform
content: Thank you for signing up! We're excited to have you on board.

title: Account Verification
content: Please verify your email address to activate your account.

title: New Feature Released
content: Check out our new dark mode feature available in settings.

title: Subscription Renewal
content: Your subscription will renew automatically on 2024-09-10.

title: Security Alert
content: We detected a login attempt from an unknown device.
